Package com.flipfit.business

Interface FlipFitAdminServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitAdminServiceImpl
public interface FlipFitAdminServiceInterface
Service interface for administrative functionalities in the FlipFit system. This contract defines all the operations that a System Admin can perform, such as managing gym and gym owner approvals and removals.

  • Method Details

    • getPendingGyms

      List<Gym> getPendingGyms()
      Retrieves a list of all gyms that are pending administrative approval.
      Returns:
      A List of Gym objects awaiting approval.

    • getAllGyms

      List<Gym> getAllGyms()
      Retrieves a list of all registered gyms in the system.
      Returns:
      A List of all Gym objects.

    • approveGym

      void approveGym(String gymId)
      Approves a single pending gym.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique identifier of the gym to be approved.

    • rejectGym

      void rejectGym(String gymId)
      Rejects a single pending gym request.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique identifier of the gym to be rejected.

    • removeGym

      void removeGym(String gymId)
      Removes an existing gym from the system.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique identifier of the gym to be removed.

    • getPendingGymOwners

      List<GymOwner> getPendingGymOwners()
      Retrieves a list of all gym owners that are pending administrative approval.
      Returns:
      A List of GymOwner objects awaiting approval.

    • getAllGymOwners

      List<GymOwner> getAllGymOwners()
      Retrieves a list of all registered gym owners in the system.
      Returns:
      A List of all GymOwner objects.

    • approveGymOwner

      void approveGymOwner(String ownerId)
      Approves a single pending gym owner.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The unique identifier of the gym owner to be approved.

    • rejectGymOwner

      void rejectGymOwner(String ownerId)
      Rejects a single pending gym owner request.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The unique identifier of the gym owner to be rejected.

    • removeGymOwner

      void removeGymOwner(String ownerId)
      Removes an existing gym owner from the system. This might also involve handling the gyms owned by them.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The unique identifier of the gym owner to be removed.
